explanation: Multiple users express that BTC is trending upwards or is in a recovery phase after trapping buyers. Some users mention confirmation from green candles and support holding at key levels (106,800, 106.5k). There is also mention of a horizontal support/resistance flip and technical confirmations for further upside, but there is also ongoing caution due to potential traps and sideways action, reflecting only medium confidence.
